comments:

"An error has occured, see error log for more details."

Can you please provide the exact steps on how to reproduce this exception. I 
cannot reproduce this exception in any of the normal scenarios i have tried.

I was trying to manually convert an existing project to a web-aware project by
carefully editing the .project, .classpath, .wtpruntime files. It appeared to
work on one machine, but when checking-out the project on another machine I had
all sorts of troubles, even with the normal build properties pages.

I will close this bug and create an enhancement request to be able to convert a
project to web-project and back, similar to how I can add aspectj nature to a
project.

Sorry for the noise.

Marking as verified to confirm this issue correctly categorized.
If, as originator, you disagree please re-open, or open a new bug. 

Thanks very much for reporting and helping make WTP better.
